name: 2 in STANLEY® FATMAX® PBT Flat Paint Brush
description: STANLEY® FATMAX® PBT professional paint brushes are designed to perform well with all paints and have superior performance with paint and primer in one coatings and low VOC coatings.all while being solvent resistant and easy to clean.

name: 2 pc Paint Brush Set
description: STANLEY premium paint brushes are designed to perform well with all paints. Our 100% tipped and flagged solid round tapered (SRT) polyester filaments ensure durability while a smooth chiseled edge allows for even paint distribution with no drag or brush marks.
